content: Sean Hannity offered to have himself waterboarded. Hannity offers to be Waterboarded by Charles Grodin Oh, well. This is, I believe, a "golden moment" in the history of televised media. Sean Hannity had actor Charles Grodin on his show tonight, and the two men actually had some genuinely good natured sparring with each other over the news of the week. Hannity asked Grodin if he'd ever accept a book from Hugo Chavez or listen to a speech by a "brutal thug murdering dictator like Daniel Ortega." Grodin's respective ripostes were "I'd hand him my book!" and "I'd listen to anybody. I'm listening to you." Grodin then went on to ask Hannity if he was wearing mascara and if he had any plans to marry Ann Coulter. But that's not the fun part! This is the fun part: GRODIN: You're for torture. HANNITY: I am for enhanced interrogation. GRODIN: You don't believe it's torture. Have you ever been waterboarded? HANNITY: No, but Ollie North has. GRODIN: Would you consent to be waterboarded? We can waterboard you? HANNITY: Sure. GRODIN: Are you busy on Sunday? HANNITY: I'll do it for charity. I'll let you do it. I'll do it for the troops' families. "http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2009/04/22/hannity-offers-to-be-wate_n_190354.html" Will he do it? Should he do it? Will he risk messing up that hair helmet? Will you watch it?

HANNITY: I am for enhanced interrogation. GRODIN: You don't believe it's torture. Have you ever been waterboarded? HANNITY: No, but Ollie North has. GRODIN: Would you consent to be waterboarded? We can waterboard you? HANNITY: Sure. GRODIN: Are you busy on Sunday? HANNITY: I'll do it for charity. I'll let you do it. I'll do it for the troops' families. "http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2009/04/22/hannity-offers-to-be-wate_n_190354.html" Will he do it? Should he do it? Will he risk messing up that hair helmet? Will you watch it?
title: Will He Do It? Sean Hannity Says He Will be Waterboarded for Charity!

content: "http://www.hannity.com/goout.asp?u=http://www.americasupportsyou.mil" Hannity supports our US Troops! Give credit where credit is due. IMHO! This is from Hannity's web page. "Thank our Troops"! "Support Our Troops" There is a slide show on this page. "THE UNIT" - "Actors Robert Patrick and Max Martini, cast members from the television series "The Unit," pose for a photo with a soldier during a USO Spring Troop visit to Forward Operating Base Fenty, Afghanistan, April 23, 2009. Staff Sgt. Adora Medina" Some "actors" have various views. But, thank God, a lot of them Support our Troops! Grodin has a different project. All worthy. But please understand that US Citizens support our Troops and the Vets too. It is not yet Sunday. Give Hannity a chance. Thank you...Agent 99!

content: When it is being done to you it is torture, like Cindy Lauper's "singing", when you are doing it, it is enhansed interogation. What we call "water boarding" , using legaleese, is not torture. The method where they fill your stomach until you are in great pain, in danger of death, is. I have no doubt that Hannity will submit himself if the "pot" gets large enough. $1,000 won't do it, I'm guessing that some "event" where the "pot" exceeds $100,000 total might do it. But who will put up the "green"?
reply: When it is being done to you it is torture, like Cindy Lauper's "singing", when you are doing it, it is enhansed interogation. What we call "water boarding" , using legaleese, is not torture. content: I teach SCUBA for a living. Any qualified, certified SCUBA diver knows how to establish "airway control." In fact, I can breathe off a SCUBA tank without a regulator attached....I would volunteer to be waterboarded just to show that once a person establishes airway control, waterboarding is NOT TORTURE....And although it's a wet breath, a person can still breathe....Anyone who has done the bailout in the NAUI Divemaster course can successfully resist waterboarding. Duane A. Brinson Lahaina, HI. U.S.M.C. 1985-1989
reply: I teach SCUBA for a living. Any qualified, certified SCUBA diver knows how to establish "airway control." In fact, I can breathe off a SCUBA tank without a regulator attached....I would volunteer to be waterboarded just to show that once a person establishes airway control, waterboarding is NOT TORTURE....And although it's a wet breath, a person can still breathe....Anyone who has done the bailout in the NAUI Divemaster course can successfully resist waterboarding. content: Sean Hannity offered to have himself waterboarded. Hannity offers to be Waterboarded by Charles Grodin Oh, well. This is, I believe, a "golden moment" in the history of televised media. Sean Hannity had actor Charles Grodin on his show tonight, and the two men actually had some genuinely good natured sparring with each other over the news of the week. Hannity asked Grodin if he'd ever accept a book from Hugo Chavez or listen to a speech by a "brutal thug murdering dictator like Daniel Ortega." Grodin's respective ripostes were "I'd hand him my book!" and "I'd listen to anybody. I'm listening to you." Grodin then went on to ask Hannity if he was wearing mascara and if he had any plans to marry Ann Coulter. But that's not the fun part! This is the fun part: GRODIN: You're for torture. HANNITY: I am for enhanced interrogation. GRODIN: You don't believe it's torture. Have you ever been waterboarded? HANNITY: No, but Ollie North has. GRODIN: Would you consent to be waterboarded? We can waterboard you? HANNITY: Sure. GRODIN: Are you busy on Sunday? HANNITY: I'll do it for charity. I'll let you do it. I'll do it for the troops' families. "http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2009/04/22/hannity-offers-to-be-wate_n_190354.html" Will he do it? Should he do it? Will he risk messing up that hair helmet? Will you watch it?

We can waterboard you? HANNITY: Sure. GRODIN: Are you busy on Sunday? HANNITY: I'll do it for charity. I'll let you do it. I'll do it for the troops' families. HANNITY: I am for enhanced interrogation. GRODIN: You don't believe it's torture. Have you ever been waterboarded? HANNITY: No, but Ollie North has. GRODIN: Would you consent to be waterboarded? We can waterboard you? HANNITY: Sure. GRODIN: Are you busy on Sunday? HANNITY: I'll do it for charity. I'll let you do it. I'll do it for the troops' families. "http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2009/04/22/hannity-offers-to-be-wate_n_190354.html" Will he do it? Should he do it? Will he risk messing up that hair helmet? Will you watch it?
reply: Apparently, he's already backpedaled! It is not our belief or disbelief that can make or unmake the fact. ~ Thomas Paine
title: Will He Do It? Sean Hannity Says He Will be Waterboarded for Charity!

content: "http://www.hannity.com/goout.asp?u=http://www.americasupportsyou.mil" Hannity supports our US Troops! Give credit where credit is due. IMHO! This is from Hannity's web page. "Thank our Troops"! "Support Our Troops" There is a slide show on this page. "THE UNIT" - "Actors Robert Patrick and Max Martini, cast members from the television series "The Unit," pose for a photo with a soldier during a USO Spring Troop visit to Forward Operating Base Fenty, Afghanistan, April 23, 2009. Staff Sgt. Adora Medina" Some "actors" have various views. But, thank God, a lot of them Support our Troops! Grodin has a different project. All worthy. But please understand that US Citizens support our Troops and the Vets too. It is not yet Sunday. Give Hannity a chance. Thank you...Agent 99!

content: When it is being done to you it is torture, like Cindy Lauper's "singing", when you are doing it, it is enhansed interogation. What we call "water boarding" , using legaleese, is not torture. The method where they fill your stomach until you are in great pain, in danger of death, is. I have no doubt that Hannity will submit himself if the "pot" gets large enough. $1,000 won't do it, I'm guessing that some "event" where the "pot" exceeds $100,000 total might do it. But who will put up the "green"?

content: I teach SCUBA for a living. Any qualified, certified SCUBA diver knows how to establish "airway control." In fact, I can breathe off a SCUBA tank without a regulator attached....I would volunteer to be waterboarded just to show that once a person establishes airway control, waterboarding is NOT TORTURE....And although it's a wet breath, a person can still breathe....Anyone who has done the bailout in the NAUI Divemaster course can successfully resist waterboarding. Duane A. Brinson Lahaina, HI. U.S.M.C. 1985-1989
reply: I teach SCUBA for a living. Any qualified, certified SCUBA diver knows how to establish "airway control." In fact, I can breathe off a SCUBA tank without a regulator attached....I would volunteer to be waterboarded just to show that once a person establishes airway control, waterboarding is NOT TORTURE....And although it's a wet breath, a person can still breathe....Anyone who has done the bailout in the NAUI Divemaster course can successfully resist waterboarding. content: Sean Hannity offered to have himself waterboarded. Hannity offers to be Waterboarded by Charles Grodin Oh, well. This is, I believe, a "golden moment" in the history of televised media. Sean Hannity had actor Charles Grodin on his show tonight, and the two men actually had some genuinely good natured sparring with each other over the news of the week. Hannity asked Grodin if he'd ever accept a book from Hugo Chavez or listen to a speech by a "brutal thug murdering dictator like Daniel Ortega." Grodin's respective ripostes were "I'd hand him my book!" and "I'd listen to anybody. I'm listening to you." Grodin then went on to ask Hannity if he was wearing mascara and if he had any plans to marry Ann Coulter. But that's not the fun part! This is the fun part: GRODIN: You're for torture. HANNITY: I am for enhanced interrogation. GRODIN: You don't believe it's torture. Have you ever been waterboarded? HANNITY: No, but Ollie North has. GRODIN: Would you consent to be waterboarded? We can waterboard you? HANNITY: Sure. GRODIN: Are you busy on Sunday? HANNITY: I'll do it for charity. I'll let you do it. I'll do it for the troops' families. "http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2009/04/22/hannity-offers-to-be-wate_n_190354.html" Will he do it? Should he do it? Will he risk messing up that hair helmet? Will you watch it?
reply: Sean Hannity offered to have himself waterboarded. Hannity offers to be Waterboarded by Charles Grodin Oh, well. This is, I believe, a "golden moment" in the history of televised media. Sean Hannity had actor Charles Grodin on his show tonight, and the two men actually had some genuinely good natured sparring with each other over the news of the week. Hannity asked Grodin if he'd ever accept a book from Hugo Chavez or listen to a speech by a "brutal thug murdering dictator like Daniel Ortega." We can waterboard you? HANNITY: Sure. GRODIN: Are you busy on Sunday? HANNITY: I'll do it for charity. I'll let you do it. I'll do it for the troops' families. "http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2009/04/22/hannity-offers-to-be-wate_n_190354.html" Will he do it? Should he do it? Will he risk messing up that hair helmet? Will you watch it?

content: quote: Originally posted by klassylady25: And you made it. I hope he does too. To be honest, the only reason I made it is because I knew it was training. I don' t know what would have happened if I had been in real enemy hands. They don't tend to stop after 5 minutes. I am not saying I would talk, I am saying that IMHO, SERE waterboarding is not the same as enhanced waterboarding. Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin

content: "http://www.hannity.com/goout.asp?u=http://www.americasupportsyou.mil" Hannity supports our US Troops! Give credit where credit is due. IMHO! This is from Hannity's web page. "Thank our Troops"! "Support Our Troops" There is a slide show on this page. "THE UNIT" - "Actors Robert Patrick and Max Martini, cast members from the television series "The Unit," pose for a photo with a soldier during a USO Spring Troop visit to Forward Operating Base Fenty, Afghanistan, April 23, 2009. Staff Sgt. Adora Medina" Some "actors" have various views. But, thank God, a lot of them Support our Troops! Grodin has a different project. All worthy. But please understand that US Citizens support our Troops and the Vets too. It is not yet Sunday. Give Hannity a chance. Thank you...Agent 99!

content: quote: Originally posted by klassylady25: So should we all. It would bring an understanding and appreciation in being an American again and not just spoiled brats. content: When it is being done to you it is torture, like Cindy Lauper's "singing", when you are doing it, it is enhansed interogation. What we call "water boarding" , using legaleese, is not torture. The method where they fill your stomach until you are in great pain, in danger of death, is. I have no doubt that Hannity will submit himself if the "pot" gets large enough. $1,000 won't do it, I'm guessing that some "event" where the "pot" exceeds $100,000 total might do it. But who will put up the "green"?

content: I teach SCUBA for a living. Any qualified, certified SCUBA diver knows how to establish "airway control." In fact, I can breathe off a SCUBA tank without a regulator attached....I would volunteer to be waterboarded just to show that once a person establishes airway control, waterboarding is NOT TORTURE....And although it's a wet breath, a person can still breathe....Anyone who has done the bailout in the NAUI Divemaster course can successfully resist waterboarding. Duane A. Brinson Lahaina, HI. U.S.M.C. 1985-1989
